attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am petitioning for roger daltrey to be knighted not only for his his services to music over the past 44 years but also for his services to charity for raising millions of pounds for the teenage cancer trust. If michael parkinson can get one for chatting to celebrities im sure roger should be given one for helping change childrens lives.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
